tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: IT'S GETTING LATE
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: www.miumiu.com Miu Miu Women's Tales It's Getting Late, directed by Massy Tadjedin In the translucent LA dusk we discover four women living very different lives. The camera follows each as they wind down their working days, their four stories weaving together as each prepares for their evening. Shot by Iranian-American screenwriter and director, Massy Tadjedin, with a stellar international cast, Aubrey Plaza, Gemma Arterton, Patricia Clarkson and Rinko Kikuchi, culminating in a gripping cameo performance by rising songstress, Zola Jesus. "We make our faces, our suits, our selves just a little more ready for wherever it is we're going. Fashion is never just the clothes. It's our mood, our excitement for something, our expectations, our attitudes, our outlooks. Managing those is often what getting ready is all about and that's what our short tries to capture." Massy Tadjedin The four women quietly take part in their private acts of preparation, but the transformation is also psychological, as they take stock of the day and mentally prepare for the evening ahead. It's Getting Late is the fourth film in Miu Miu's series of short films, the Women's Tales, by leading female directors, Zoe Cassavetes, Lucrecia Martel and Giada Colagrande. Each film explores the feminine love affair with Miu Miu through the lens of their diverse sensibilities.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: wow i love﻿ the way they incorporated the clothing/bags/shoes/glasses, swoonworthy, and the music is great!!
seriously it sucks.There is something﻿ special but some magic is missing and without magic﻿ it can't works
I want my 8 minutes back. why this is being advertised﻿ is beyond me...
è una﻿ cazzata ideata da qualche stilista frocio.
Great shot, great﻿ soundtrack, really great way to highlight products without making it all about the product.

This was so pointless. Lot's of lovely shots of some women, and then a singer sings. No story, no comment, no point of view, nothing. Just some nice shots. It said nothing. I spent the whole time﻿ waiting to be shown something. Boring.
Aubrey Plaza :)﻿
i love﻿ porn this was great
Woah. This is awesome.﻿ Great job.
I was expecting to listen to "Night," but "Ixode" and﻿ "Vessel" worked too ;) Stunning film, loved Zola.
Love it! ﻿ Glad I clicked the ad to watch.
Pretty kool﻿
whats the title of﻿ music used?
zola <3 ﻿
Omg thanks﻿ ^^
Io continuo﻿ a vederla.

La stilista in questione si chiama Miuccia Prada , è la seconda donna più potente al mondo nell'ambito della moda ( fonte Time Magazine) , nonchè genio dell'arte contemporanea
Il video è stato ideato da Massy Tadjedin sceneggiatrice iraniana , nonchè regista di The Jacket
Io﻿ non vedo alcuna cazzata :)
it's getting late...it's﻿ true!!!
boring﻿ :(
is... is this intelligent﻿ dance music?
A story is not always strictly necessary. Form without a content can be a content in itself. If images are﻿ beautiful then they are just good to look at. Personally I loved the video.
amazing.﻿
I﻿ love this.

correggo, è la sceneggiatrice di﻿ tha jacket. Per il resto, ahimè se non si ha la sensibilità per coglierle certe cose è inutile stare a spiegare ;) a uno poi che si esprime usando il termine "frocio"....
la prima secondo time magazine è la wintour?

Reviewer.Books: Anything by the lovely Francesca Lia Block, Inspirational books by SARK and Makeup related books :D

Reviewer.Movies: scary movie series, mythbusters, simpsons, jeff dunham, whose line is it anyway, and other funny shows
Reviewer.Music: limp bizkit, foo fighters, moby, the prodigy,punjabi mc, techno ,electronic(a)

Reviewer.Books: Marvel, DC Comics, Image, Oni Press, IDW, Top Shelf, Avatar
